snippet: Google’s executive chairman, Eric Schmidt, is to leave Monday from Beijing on a commercial flight to North Korea, the country thought to have the world’s most restrictive Internet policies.
abstract: Google executive chairman Eric Schmidt is to leave Beijing on commercial flight to North Korea, country thought to have the world’s most restrictive Internet policies.
lead_paragraph: Google’s executive chairman, Eric Schmidt, is to leave Monday from Beijing on a commercial flight to North Korea, the country thought to have the world’s most restrictive Internet policies.

headline.seo: North Korea: Google Leader on Way
headline.main: Google Leader on Way to North Korea
headline.print_headline: North Korea: Google Leader on Way
